  • Method Details

    • updatePossibleTargets

      public void updatePossibleTargets(Board board) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Updates the possible moves for this piece on a given board. The Amazon piece can move like a Knight, Bishop, or Rook.
      Specified by:
      updatePossibleTargets in class Piece
      Parameters:
      board - the current game board
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the current tile is null
